page.title: 18Sarn Young Farmers
page.content: The Young Farmers meet in the{Village {Hall}every{Monday}at eight o'clock. They used to let people of eleven join but they soon stopped that,because they only spoilt it for the older ones.Now they only allow children of thirteen or older to join. There are{twenty nine members}in Young Farmers Club.The young farmers have a{Rally}once a year.A girl has to change a car wheel and a boy has to iron a shirt.There is disco dancing, boys shear sheep while the girls lap the wool.There is cooking.You can either cook Chinese or Japanese food. Not so long ago they did a play in{ {Theatre Hafren.}It was a western.Once they did a{sponsored bike}ride which was twenty miles.Every year they have a competition against each other.They practise for the rally nearly every day of the week.
